titleStmt.title: Some queries concerning the work of God in the world which is to be expected in the latter ages thereof with a few plain words to the nation of England, tending towards stopping the future breakings forth of Gods wrath, both upon the people and powers thereof : with an advertisement relating to the present state of things.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by R. Wilson ...,

notesStmt.note: Heading of p. 5 in two lines rather than one.
Signed at end: Isaac Penington, the younger.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
